spec: add more unit tests to messaging-core
commitMessage:
Add comprehensive unit tests for messaging-core module

Added new unit tests for:
1. Message class - testing all constructors, properties, and payload handling
2. TopicSubscriber - testing subscription and message handling logic
3. MessageDispatchingService - testing message dispatching and correlation ID propagation
4. MessageRepository - testing repository operations with mocks

Also updated build.gradle.kts to include necessary test dependencies.
